resources.string:
This is a progress tracker app. Below is a quick guide of how to make one yourself 

 To make you tracker, press the create tracker button from the main menu and you will be presented with 7 empty trackers. Pick which you want to create. 

 Inside the input page ,you are required to enter your first name, or student ID, and the title of your project. After that, please enter your main chapters and artifact tasks in their respective areas. Please note that you can only have a maximum of 25 items in total. 

 Enter the continue button once you are satisfied and you will be directed back to the main menu where you can access your newly made tracker. Simply select the tracker that has the name you have entered in the previous page. 

 Within the tracker page, you will be presented with a list of tasks based around your input that made the tracker and a circle progress bar. if one of your tasks is completed, simply press on that task and it will change to green. Indicating that it has been completed and increase progression in the circle progress bar. You can also press the task again to tell the tracker that it is still incomplete, changing the color to white and reducing progress inside the circle progress bar. 

 If you want to delete your tracker, simply press the delete button at the bottom of your tracker page. once done, you will be redirected back to the main menu.
